title: Royalty Free Music with no license fees!
description: Thanks for Visiting a Portal Dedicated to Royalty FREE Music Tracks for Developers! Here you can find Royalty Free music tracks and loops in different styles.  This site is geared towards film and video game developers, and you can use my music for both commercial and non-commercial application without paying a penny.  All I ask in return is that you put me and my site in your credits. If you love my music and appreciate this free service, please consider a donation.
